adjectives.description: pansyish (comparative more pansyish, superlative most pansyish)

entries.meaning: (derogatory, colloquial) Of a man: effeminate, weak, wussy.
examples: Jocelyn Brooke's brilliant, semi-autobiographical The Military Orchid deals with the author's sensitive, precocious, pansyish childhood, defined largely by the pursuit of exotic orchids and addiction to fireworks.
